channel.title: Comments on: Off on another jaunt

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Thanks Fi and Ed. I haven't really got any plans other than to have a look around the city. Just be a typical tourist I suppose :)</p>
item.content:encoded: Thanks Fi and Ed. I haven’t really got any plans other than to have a look around the city. Just be a typical tourist I suppose ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Ed Brill
item.dc:creator: Ed Brill
item.description: <p>Happy birthday - you have the same birthday (though younger!) as Rob Novak (www.lotusdigerati.com).<br/>Going anywhere besides Washington DC? </p>
item.content:encoded:
Happy birthday – you have the same birthday (though younger!) as Rob Novak (www.lotusdigerati.com).
Going anywhere besides Washington DC?

item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Have a splendid holiday Matthew!! See you soon</p>
item.content:encoded: Have a splendid holiday Matthew!! See you soon
